entries.arrival_phase_1: We are pinpointing the location of their 'Hero' now. He's using some sort of scrambler, so we are not sure what kind of escort he has.
entries.arrival_phase_2: Alright, proceed to intercept him. We will update you with new coordinates as he is moving.
entries.assassinate_success: Beautifully done pilot, I would love to see the faces of the officers at that ceremony when they hear about this.
entries.escort_remaining: Tactical Computer: < Scans show one of main targets escort vessels terminated. >
entries.escort_wiped_out: Tactical Computer: < Scans show only battle functioning vessel in area is main target. >
entries.failed_escape: He got away. Oh well, we'll get him the next time.
entries.quest_location_d: The Endor system is fairly unknown to us but initial intel shows that the Empire has been gathering an unusually large force here. For now, it remains a mystery as to why but for you, this means extra caution is to be used.
entries.quest_target_d: This Imperial officer is not on his way to an award ceremony for nothing. He's flying one of the deadly TIE Advanced models and he's a skilled pilot so be swift, effective and careful.
entries.split_quest_alert: Rebel Command: < We need some scan data from a region in this sector, stand by for new coordinates. >
entries.title: Endor system: Terminate the Imperial "Hero".
entries.title_d: An Imperial fighter pilot is on his way to be decorated for his victories against us. Let's send a message to the Empire they will not forget by making sure he never reaches his award ceremony.
